name: The Bot Forge Chatbot
author: The Bot Forge

sections.description:
Welcome to The Bot Forge, a cutting-edge platform where you can create your own AI-powered chatbots trained on your proprietary data! Whether you need a chatbot for customer service, sales assistance, or any other function, The Bot Forge makes it simple and effective.

Key Features and Functionality

  • Custom Chatbot Creation: Train and customize chatbots with diverse data sources like documents, videos, and web links.
  • Website Integration: Effortlessly embed chatbots into your site as customer service reps, sales assistants, and more.
  • Customization and Branding: Tailor chatbot appearance and features to align with your branding strategy.
  • AI-Driven Contact Form: Convert standard forms into dynamic interfaces for surveys, lead gen, and customer support.
  • Subscription Plans and Add-Ons: Choose from tiered subscriptions with scalable features tailored to your needs. Freemium plan available.

Benefits to Users

  • Boost customer engagement with 24/7 automated service.
  • Enhance lead generation and qualification through intelligent chatbot interactions.
  • Streamline internal operations with dedicated HR and internal assistance bots.
  • Increase sales and conversion rates with on-demand product recommendations and support.
  • Ensure brand consistency across all customer interactions with fully customizable designs.

Third-Party Services

This plugin relies on the following third-party service:

  • Service Name: The Bot Forge
  • Service URL: https://app.thebotforge.ai
  • Terms of Use: https://thebotforge.ai/terms
  • Privacy Policy: https://thebotforge.ai/privacy-policy

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL-2.0-or-later. For more information, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the-bot-forge-chatbot to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to ‘The Bot Forge Chatbot Settings’ in the WordPress admin menu.
  4. Enter your Bot Forge Chatbot ID to connect your chatbot with your WordPress site.
sections.faq:
How do I get a Bot Forge Chatbot ID?

Visit app.thebotforge.ai and sign up for a free account. Create your chatbot using our intuitive platform. Once your chatbot is ready, copy the Bot ID from the Share tab – WordPress section.

Can I specify which pages the chatbot appears on?

Yes, you can enter the page IDs or slugs where you want the chatbot to appear in the plugin settings. Separate multiple entries with commas. Leave blank to appear on all pages.

What are the system requirements?

Your site must be running WordPress 5.0 or higher and PHP 7.2 or higher.

  • Updated Readme

1.5.1

  • Added logo to settings page

1.5

  • Updated to ensure compatibility with the latest WordPress version 6.5.
  • Improved compliance with WordPress plugin guidelines.
  • Added documentation for third-party services used by the plugin.

1.3

  • Initial release of The Bot Forge Chatbot plugin.
